_description: On the Commencements of the Seasons — four lines (aaba)

CULEe112.Transcription:
Petyrs cheyr begynnythe VerAnd Vrban begynnyth SomerSymphoryan
                    begynythe HarvestClement begynnythe Wynter
CULEe112.Note:
Names of the seasons to the left of each line; prose notes
                    below.
CULEe112.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “English Almanacks of the XVth Century.” 
             Philological Quarterly
         18 (1939): 321-31: 322.
